version_description:
1, Minor UI update.
2, In main view, when photos are taken in Burst mode, it will show the number of photos. For example, when it shows [250KB  x10], it means that there are 10 photos in this collection and each photo is about 250KB. It is easier for you to quickly check if a collection of Burst photos takes too much space.

1, Sort images by size.
    (Free users could view the top 10 biggest images. Please upgrade to Pro version to view all the sorted images.)
2, Performance improved.
3, Bug fix.
Now you could change the photo type by tapping the main view's title. No need to go to [Settings] view to change it any more.

1. Support for iOS 10.
2. Now you can multi select & delete images.

Now PhoTop is available in iMessage app store. 
  1, You could see the size of the image before sending it to your friend.
  2, You could easily find GIFs and small images on your iOS device, and send them to your friend fast in iMessage.

An update for PhoTop iMessage version:
  - Now you could resize images and GIFs, and send a smaller one to your friend.

Added 3D Touch support for images in main view.
1. You can 3D Touch one image and peek it.
2. You can 3D Touch one image and slide it up to delete it fast.

1. Search images by custom resolution range.
2. Image statistics by resolution.
3. Share image with other apps.

New features are added:
- Sort images by color, resolution.
- Search images by color.

1. New feature: Save Smaller Photo.
2. UI update.

1. Support for iOS 11.
2. New feature: After saving a picture, you can choose to keep the original picture, or delete it right away.
3. Bug fix: wrong picture may be saved in some cases. Now it's fixed.

New feature:
  - Upgraded filtering function:
     Now you can use multiple filter rules at the same time.
     New filter rule is added: Filter by Shape.
Bug fix on iOS 11:
  - Fixed a bug where sorting by size couldn't work.
  - Fixed a bug where new Live Photo(HEIC+MOV)'s size couldn't be calculated correctly.
  - UI bug fix.
Stability is improved.

1, Performance improvement for below functionalities on iOS 11.
    - Sorting photos by color.
    - Loading Gifs.
2, New feature: Multiple Save(Select multiple photos, then save them together).
Fixed a localization issue for [Multiple Select & Save].

1. Favorite/Unfavorite photos.
2. Tap to add photo to album. Tap again to remove it from album.

1.  New features when saving smaller images & GIFs.
    - Now when saving image, you can choose different compression ratios. 
ã€€- And when saving GIF, you have the option to reduce number of frames.
2. Easier to add images to album in batch.
    - Now album position can be remembered. After you added one image to an album, when you open next image, the albums area will be expanded automatically, and the previously tapped album will show in front of you.

1. More powerful filtering functions:
  a) New function [Filter by Size].
  b) New function [Filter by Date].
  c) Enhanced [Filter by Color]. Now you can choose different level of hue, saturation, brightness.
2. Some other small updates, making PhoTop more user friendly.

1. New features:
  a) Easily find all images on same day through context menu.
  b) Statistics by date. Easily find the days when you have more images.
2. UI update:
  Image thumbnail is now in correct size on newer iPhone models.
3. Support for iOS 13.

1. UI redesign.
2. Filters view is redesigned.
3. New feature: Pie chart for image statistics:
    - Statistics by Size
    - Statistics by Resolution
4. Fixed a crash bug when loading size info.
